sentence.Network_en: The Oriental is a comfortable hotel, but rather inconveniently situated.
sentence.Network_cn: 东方大酒店是个舒适的宾馆，但地理位置却非常不方便。

sentence.Network_en: Hardware encrypting resists decryption intensely, but it use inconveniently for user.
sentence.Network_cn: 硬件加密方法有较强的抗解密性, 但用户使用不方便.

sentence.Network_en: Even implementing the interest - deferral scheme for homeowners has proved inconveniently tricky.
sentence.Network_cn: 甚至是对房主实行的推迟利息的方案,结果证明也是极不方便的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: inconvenient 不便的inconveniently 不方便地inconvertibility 不能交换
inconveniently located transit stops Bus or train stops located in places where no one wants to use them are a good recipe for failure .位置不便的公交车站——位于一些没人想去用的地方的巴士站或是火车站是优秀的失败窍门。

list.abs: 李开复谈创新 - ks_renyuan的日志... ... 马不需要吃饭睡觉嘛 Horse needs to be fed and needs sleep 很麻烦 Very inconvenient.
...时社会、经济的不济，让人看见了不愿面对，使人难堪的不方便的真相(inconvenient truth)，疫症正好去改变这些现状 — 不论是政 …
most consumers do not consider short - term traffic inconvenience factor ., 以外 , 大部分消费者已不考虑短期内交通不便的因素.
...民可以在美国起诉，但是问题在于美国法院和可能会以“不方便法院(forum inconvenience)”为由拒绝受理。

entry.tran: 不方便的;打扰的;令人为难的
entry.def: Something that is inconvenient causes problems or difficulties for someone.

example.ex: Can you come at 10.30? I know it's inconvenient for you, but I must see you...
example.tran: 你能 10 点半来吗？我知道你不方便,但是我必须见你。

example.ex: It's very inconvenient to have to wait so long...

sentences.sentence: "he arrived at an inconveniently late hour"

auth_sentence.content: Inconveniently, that vision was heresy from end to end.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inconveniently, that vision was heresy from end to end.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inconveniently, that vision was heresy from end to end.

auth_sentence.content: Inconveniently the numbers don't divide cleanly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inconveniently the numbers don't divide cleanly.

auth_sentence.content: Her heart had remained, indeed, most inconveniently young, its sympathies were all with youth and its fervours.
